name: Brian Sonnier
description: Sonnier has been the club sponsor and lead mentor since the club was founded. His engineering and organizational skills help our club grow and develop member's futures around STEM.

name: Justin Maham
description: Since Fall 2019, he has brought his Mechanical Engineering skills and FIRST robotics experience to help us design and build our robot.

name: Shagun Ahluwalia
description: She has been volunteering since Fall 2019 and brings her business knowledge and management consulting skills to help members enhance their organizational strategy.

name: Mikala Garcia
description: As the Talent Branding Coordinator at Waste Management, Ms. Garcia helps our club have the resources we need to develop and build our robots.
